@graph.name: Road Network Optimization - Complete Coverage Routing for Municipalities - Route4Me
@graph.description: Calculate exact mileage and time needed to cover all roads in a specific region. Draw shapes on maps to visualize efficient coverage routes for municipalities, surveyors, and winter maintenance contractors.
@graph.keywords: road network optimization, municipal route planning, road coverage analysis, street sweeping routes, snow removal routing, road survey planning, complete coverage routing, road maintenance routing, salt spreading routes, municipal fleet optimization, street coverage calculation, infrastructure mapping, public works routing, street network analysis, winter maintenance routing

@graph.name: Road Network Optimization for Municipal Operations
@graph.description: Route4Me's Road Network Optimization add-on is the first commercially available software that lets you draw an area on a map and plan an optimal route to cover every section of road in that region in the shortest amount of time. Unlike regular route optimization for visiting addresses, this solution figures out the best way to visit road segments while considering one-way streets and U-turn restrictions, providing accurate mileage calculations essential for municipalities, road surveyors, and contractors bidding on salt spreading or snow cleaning routes.

@graph.name: Request Road Network Optimization Demo
@graph.description: Contact our municipal solutions team to discuss implementing Road Network Optimization for your organization

@graph.name: Operational Benefits
